Control Name: 1.9.4 Shared disks are leveraged for suitable workloads.
Control Statement: You can leverage shared disks to enable cost-effective clustering instead of setting up own shared disks via S2D (Storage Spaces Direct). Sample workloads that would benefit from shared disks are: SQL Server Failover Cluster Instances (FCI), Scale-out File Server (SoFS), File Server for General Use (IW workload) and SAP ASCS/SCS.
